verses.verse: There is <S%H3426><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> is common <S%H7227><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> men: <S%H120><s%>

A man <S%H376><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> riches, <S%H6239><s%> wealth, <S%H5233><s%> and honor, <S%H3519><s%> so that he wanteth <S%H2638><s%> nothing <S%H369><s%> for his soul <S%H5315><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he desireth, <S%H183><s%> yet God <S%H430><s%> giveth him not power <S%H7980><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> thereof, <S%H4480><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> a stranger <S%H376><s%> <S%H5237><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> it: this <S%H2088><s%> is vanity, <S%H1892><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> is an evil <S%H7451><s%> disease. <S%H2483><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> beget <S%H3205><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> children, and live <S%H2421><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> so that the days <S%H3117><s%> of his years <S%H8141><s%> be <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> many, <S%H7227><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> filled <S%H7646><s%> with <S%H4480><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> that he have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> burial; <S%H6900><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> that an untimely birth <S%H5309><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> he.

For <S%H3588><s%> he cometh <S%H935><s%> in with vanity, <S%H1892><s%> and departeth <S%H1980><s%> in darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> shall be covered <S%H3680><s%> with darkness. <S%H2822><s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> he hath not <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> the sun, <S%H8121><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> any thing: this <S%H2088><s%> hath more rest <S%H5183><s%> than the other. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%>

Yea, <S%H432><s%> though he live <S%H2421><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> twice <S%H6471><s%> told, yet hath he seen <S%H7200><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> good: <S%H2896><s%> do not <S%H3808><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> place? <S%H4725><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the labor <S%H5999><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is for his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and yet <S%H1571><s%> the appetite <S%H5315><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> filled. <S%H4390><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> hath the wise <S%H2450><s%> more <S%H3148><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the fool? <S%H3684><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> hath the poor, <S%H6041><s%> that knoweth <S%H3045><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the living? <S%H2416><s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is the sight <S%H4758><s%> of the eyes <S%H5869><s%> than the wandering <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1980><s%> of the desire: <S%H5315><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is also <S%H1571><s%> vanity <S%H1892><s%> and vexation <S%H7469><s%> of spirit. <S%H7307><s%>

That <S%H4100><s%> which hath been <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1961><s%> is named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> already, <S%H3528><s%> and it is known <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H834><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is man: <S%H120><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> may <S%H3201><s%> he contend <S%H1777><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him that is mightier <S%H7945><s%> <S%H8623><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> he.
Seeing <S%H3588><s%> there be <S%H3426><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> that increase <S%H7235><s%> vanity, <S%H1892><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is man <S%H120><s%> the better? <S%H3148><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> knoweth <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> for man <S%H120><s%> in this life, <S%H2416><s%> all <S%H4557><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his vain <S%H1892><s%> life <S%H2416><s%> which he spendeth <S%H6213><s%> as a shadow? <S%H6738><s%> for <S%H834><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> can tell <S%H5046><s%> a man <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him under <S%H8478><s%> the sun? <S%H8121><s%>
